title: Semente de Girassol
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Middle Eastern
description: A small, inexpensive 100% vegan place. Offers a wide selection of snacks, hamburgers, kebabs, sandwiches, fried snacks (done by air frying so no oil) and sweets (cakes, truffles, alfajor, etc.). Made-in-house vegetable milk options, such as oatmeal, soy, brazil nut, peanuts, almond and rice are available for coffee drinks, and also can be bought separately in 1L bottles.
